gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Thunder 124, Pistons 112
gameRecap.excerpt: The Thunder defeated the Pistons, 124-112. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander recorded 32 points, nine rebounds, and four assists for the Thunder, while Josh Giddey added 21 points, seven rebounds, and three assists in the victory. Jaden Ivey tallied 20 points, three assists, and two rebounds for the Piston in the losing effort. The Thunder improve to 3-1 on the season, while the Pistons fall to 2-2.
